about_the_game:
BIG JUGS. BIG THIGHS. BIG ACTION. BIG ADVENTURE.

Welcome to the world of BIG BODACIOUS BARBARIANS.

Big Bodacious Barbarians is a Story Rich, Turn Based, Adventure Game.

Join Pyra and Lucia, nine-foot-tall, THICC, Giantess Barbarian Females, as they travel across the world of Arthanus.

Battle demons, monsters, dragons & more to save the world from evil, find your missing father & snatch a good husband.

The gameplay is a mix of a kinetic visual novel and a turn-based party battle system.

No surprise mechanics, no battle passes, no microtransactions, no lootboxes. Just two BIG girls, embarking on a BIG quest.

So, sharpen your weapons, strap on your battle thongs, and get ready for a BIG bodacious adventure.

GO BIG, OR GO HOME!

You will encounter dangerous monsters as you travel across the world of Arthanus. Engage in turn-based battles and destroy these monsters, to gain experience, new skills and supplies.

As you travel, you will meet interesting characters. Some of these characters will actually assist you in specific battles.

The powerful Dragons of Good and Evil are the Demigods in the world of Arthanus. You will meet some of the Good Dragonesses and learn more about this world - and your role in it.

content_descriptors.notes:
There are no visual depictions of sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug and alcohol abuse, or self-harm in this game.

However there are some images where our two main Giantess adventurers (Pyra and Lucia) take baths.

These images (and many others) are censored with a black box.

name: Big Bodacious Barbarians

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10, Win 11
  • Processor: Intel i7, AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10, Win 11
  • Processor: Intel i7, AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
